name: Sour Cream Coffee Cake
author: K. Beth
summary: This is a great coffee cake for any time of day!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease a 9x13-inch pan, springform pan, or tube pan
Beat 1 cup sugar and butter with an electric mixer in a large bowl until light and fluffy
Add flour, sour cream, eggs, vanilla, baking powder, baking soda, and salt; continue beating until ingredients integrate into a batter
Mix walnuts, 1/2 cup sugar, and ground cinnamon in a separate bowl
Pour about half the batter into the prepared pan
Sprinkle about half the walnut topping over the batter and top with remaining batter
Finish by sprinkling remaining topping over the batter
Bake in preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 45 minutes (depending on pan used)
Cool in the pans for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack
